short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Byndr Browser Extension - New learning companion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Byndr is your personal learning companion.

With Byndr Library you can store, organise, and read material from anywhere on the web, and even your devices such as mobile and desktop.

With Byndr Learning Spaces you can repackage your materials with engaging activities for sharing with your friends and co-learners.

Byndr blends social media style communication to the serious business of learning.

Our mission is to make learning truly simple and enjoyable!
